Name: The Corridors Of The Heart
Description: You wander, lost in the depths of the Gant Pole.

DefaultEvent.Name: Lost, lost and thrice lost
DefaultEvent.Description: There is no remembering the route once the candle goes out. You stumble through the darkness for just a sliver less than forever. Finally, light in the distance, and the suddenly comforting smell of decay in the Gant Pole's charnel house of an aorta.

ChildBranches.Name: Return to the main chamber
ChildBranches.Description: The writing on the wall should lead the way.

ChildBranches.Name: Continue onwards and inward
ChildBranches.Description:
Something at the centre of the Gant Pole calls to you. To the part of you that feels tired. Weary. That craves sleep without the inevitability of waking.
 [The more you walk, the closer you will get.]
